name: Milestone 4: Introduction to JavaScript
description: Learn JavaScript basic concepts. Explore simple problem solving, understand recursion and fundamental programming concepts

name: Milestone 5: Integrate JavaScript
description: Explore DOM. How don works. Add Event bubbles. Create simple interactive website like bank transactions, shopping cart, etc.

name: Milestone 6: Intermediate JavaScript, API
description: Modern JavaScript, ES6, Create Dynamic Website. Implement API. Fetch API and understand tricky javaScript concepts.

name: Milestone 7: Explore Browser & Debug
description: Explore Browser. Debug JavaScript application. Use Dev tool. Introduction to TypeScript, Regular Expression

name: Milestone 8: Introduction to Simple React
description: React Core concepts. Understanding Props, states, components. How React Works. Build Single Page Application using React.

name: Milestone: 9 React Router and States
description: React Router Version 6, Material UI, Axios, Context API, Deploy
